newsitem.title: ITALY: Italy's stock market steams to fresh highs.
newsitem.headline: Italy's stock market steams to fresh highs.

text.p: Italy's blue-chip Mib30 stock index and the all-share Mibtel index climbed to fresh record highs in morning trade.
The Mib30 index hit 20100 before retracing a shade to stand 1.27 percent up at 20080 and the Mibtel index peaked at 13201, before trickling back to stand 1.03 percent up at 13193.
Traders say the rally of the last few days has been derivatives-driven ahead of futures and options expiries today, with massive volumes at Friday's opening as contracts went off the board.
But the rally later in the morning appeared to be driven by a general optimism about Italian stocks after undervaluation for a long time, brokers said.

"Italy's been ignored for such a long time and it's been flat in relation to other markets in Europe and the United States, and it now looks like a good opportunity to buy cheaply," said Anthony Mannara in institutional sales at brokers Milla Sim here.
